column4: <murkyMurk> you should think twice before recomending cedega... it may work better than wine for games but the fact that it the offspring of wine(opensource project) and they charge cedega is just Hilarius... Plus windows emulation may be a good alternative for the time being but encouraging people to give up on native ports as cedega generally does is just wrong
as an ex Cedega subscriber I can state that it works better for games than wine. Yes, it is based on wine but it is also enhanced
they have instructions for how to download original wine & use it. trust me, cedega is LEAGUES ahead of wine in interfaCE and usefullness
NO, It is much much more than that
